conclusion: The distance between the two rails is L = 0.5 m.
The inclination angle of the rails to the horizontal plane is θ = 30°.
The magnetic induction strength is B = 0.2 T.
The mass of rod a is m_a = 0.3 kg.
The mass of rod b is m_b = 0.1 kg.
The resistance of each rod is R = 0.1 Ω.
The constant force applied to rod a is F = 2 N.
The gravitational acceleration is g = 10 m/s².
The Joule heat generated in rod a is Q_a = 0.12 J.
The velocity of rod a is v_a = 1.0 m/s.
The induced electromotive force in rod a is E_a = 0.1 V.
The current in rod a is I_a = 1.0 A.
The induced electromotive force in rod b is E_b = 0.1 V.
The current in rod b is I_b = 1.0 A.
The force on rod b due to the magnetic field is F_b = 0.1 N.
The force on rod b due to gravity is F_{gb} = 0.5 N.
The net force on rod b is F_{netb} = 0.4 N.
The acceleration of rod b is a_b = 4.0 m/s².
The velocity of rod b is v_b = 1.55 m/s.
The speed magnitude of rod b is 1.55 m/s.
